Reviews.Title: Not long lasting..
Reviews.Author: Priince25
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in Janurary, it is now May, and it is giving me problems. These problems are mostly associated with texting, and sometimes it will say that "too many applications have been reached" and not let me proceed with sending the text. I would close all applications but it would still not work.Yesturday, it wouldn't even let me open the message page. I would have to turn off the phone and turn it back on. It's only 5 months and it is giving me problems. Other than that, I liked how the phone worked and looked.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, low price
Reviews.Author: Vic_ces "Victor Ces."
Reviews.Content: I was a little nervous about buying this phone. A lower price would be brought to Costa Rica. But when he was in my hands was very great satisfaction. The phone comes to work with any network and its functions are very good. The camera is a monster compared to the price of the phone. It was definitely a good choice
